remarks: The action of a particular group element is left-cancelable. (Contributed by FL, 17-May-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2015.)
statement:
galcan.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
galcan $p |- ( ( .(+) e. ( G GrpAct Y ) /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. Y /\ C e. Y ) ) -> ( ( A .(+) B ) = ( A .(+) C ) <-> B = C ) ) $.
